instruction:
Input the data for a specific team-member which is added to the Project Data.
-
EM May 25, 2023
code:

"""
Input the data for a specific team-member which is added to the Project Data.
-
EM May 25, 2023

    Args:
        _name: (str)
        _street: (str)
        _city: (str)
        _post_code: (str)
        _telephone: (str)
        _email: (str)
            
    Returns:
        team_member_: () A new Project Team Member which can be added to the 
            project-data using the "Set Project Data" component.
"""

import scriptcontext as sc
import Rhino as rh
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs
import ghpythonlib.components as ghc
import Grasshopper as gh

try:
    from honeybee_ph_rhino import gh_io, gh_compo_io
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import honeybee_ph_rhino:\n\t{}'.format(e))

try:
    from honeybee_ph_utils import preview
except ImportError as e:
    raise ImportError('\nFailed to import honeybee_ph_utils:\n\t{}'.format(e))
    
#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
import honeybee_ph_rhino._component_info_
reload(honeybee_ph_rhino._component_info_)
ghenv.Component.Name = "HBPH - Create Project Team Member"
DEV = honeybee_ph_rhino._component_info_.set_component_params(ghenv, dev=False)
if DEV:
    from honeybee_ph_rhino.gh_compo_io import building_create_team_member as gh_compo_io
    reload(gh_compo_io)
    reload(gh_io)

# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# -- GH Interface
IGH = gh_io.IGH( ghdoc, ghenv, sc, rh, rs, ghc, gh )


#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
gh_compo_interface = gh_compo_io.GHCompo_CreateProjectTeamMember(
        IGH, _name, _street, _city, _post_code, _telephone, _email
    )
team_member_ = gh_compo_interface.run()

#-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# -- Preview
preview.object_preview(team_member_)
